mapper.select: SELECT id, boardName, boardUrl, title, nickname, reason, reasonDetail, inserted, helpId, lifeId, newsId, questionId, title, replyId, rereplyId, categories FROM tb_report ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report (boardName, boardUrl, nickname, reason, reasonDetail, helpId, lifeId, newsId, questionId, title, replyId, rereplyId, categories) VALUES (#{boardName}, #{boardUrl}, #{nickname}, #{reason}, #{reasonDetail}, #{helpId}, #{lifeId}, #{newsId}, #{questionId}, #{title}, #{replyId}, #{rereplyId}, #{categories})
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM tb_report WHERE replyId = #{replyId}
SELECT count(id) FROM tb_report WHERE rereplyId = #{rereplyId}
